title: LEADERSHIP AND PEER KNOWLEDGE SHARING
description: Every individual in RISTEK is empowered to grow as a leader and actively share their knowledge. Each member accelerates one another by sharing skills, knowledge, and experiences.

title: GO-TO PLACE FOR GROWTH AND LEARNING
description: RISTEK aspires to be the top of mind for UIâ€™s Faculty of Computer Science students seeking an environment to grow, learn, and accelerate their professional careers.

title: PROMOTING INCLUSIVITY AND EQUAL OPPORTUNITIES
description: RISTEK is committed to being an inclusive space where everyone, regardless of their background or prior involvement, has equal opportunities to become a member, lead projects, or even serve as a director.

title: HELPING MEMBERS DISCOVER THEIR TRUE PASSION
description: RISTEK serves as a platform to guide individuals in exploring and uncovering their true passions through meaningful experiences and collaboration.

title: INNOVATION BY THE PEOPLE
description: RISTEK strives as the leading student-led IT organization in Indonesia, renowned for both our boundary-breaking innovations and the extraordinary individuals who drive them
